speaker: CLOWN
text: Why masters, have your instruments been in

speaker: CLOWN

speaker: MUSICIAN

speaker: CLOWN

text: Then put up your pipes in your bag, for I’ll

speaker: CLOWN
text: away. Go, vanish into air, away!

speaker: CASSIO
text: Dost thou hear, mine honest friend?

speaker: CASSIO
text: Prithee, keep up thy quillets.
